Interface ComponentUtils

All Known Subinterfaces:
DialogComponentUtils
All Known Implementing Classes:
About, AddedRecipes, AddIngredientsExpirationDialog, AddIngredientsExpirationDialog.IngredientExpirationQuery, AddItemDialog, AddProfileButton, CenteredPage, CookbookGrid, DropdownButton, InvalidInputDialog, Inventory, InventoryExpirationDate, InventoryList, InventoryListInput, InventoryListProgressBar, NewUserDialog, ProfileItem, ProfileItems, Profiles, RecipeCard, RecipeCard, RecipeCard.KeptPartOfIngredientItem, RecipeCard.RecipeServings, RecipeCard.RemovedPartOfIngredientItem, RecipeCardRow, RecipePage, ShoppingList, ShoppingListCategoryGroup, ShoppingListCategoryItem, ShoppingListWrapper, SideBar, SideBarItem, StandardButton, StandardCheckBox, StandardDialog, TitledPage
public interface ComponentUtils
Utils class that can be used with implements to add shorthands for easier css handling.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Leif MÃ¸rstad
